text: I've been using this phone for a few weeks now and I'm very impressed with the camera and the battery life. The 120Hz screen is also a great touch. My only complaint is that it's a bit pricey.

I recently purchased this product and so far I'm very impressed! The build quality is great and it performs very well. My only complaint is that it's a bit expensive. Overall, I would definitely recommend it to others.
